channel.title: Windows Server 2000 on DefinIT
channel.description: Recent content in Windows Server 2000 on DefinIT

item.title: Multi-homed Domain controller logs Event ID 1030 and 1058
item.description: I recently had an issue where a hosting environment was registering a lot of Netlogon Event 1030/1058 issues, being unable to find the Group Policy objects or download them. In this example, the server DC is the domain controller for DOMAIN.LCL. _Event Type: Error Event Source: Userenv Event Category: None Event ID: 1030 Date: 10/09/2009 Time: 06:24:29 User: NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM Computer: DC Description: Windows cannot query for the list of Group Policy objects.
